dc_title_s: 2010 New York City Lakes and Reservoirs
dc_description_s: This polygon layer is a subset and combination of the Census TIGER county water files for the five boroughs, re-projected to local state plane. Large, individual water features that represent lakes or reservoirs were selected from the master water feature set (nyu_2451_34516), to provide basic reference for thematic maps. The unique ID is hydroid, created by the Census. This data was created as part of the NYC Geodatabase (NYC GDB) project, a resource designed for basic geographic analysis and thematic mapping within the five boroughs of New York City.
dc_creator_sm: GIS Lab, Newman Library, Baruch CUNY
